content.raw: I'm only including the location for now in the interest of time. In fact, we only really need the ids of the two bodies in contact. My goal was to add the normal, wrench, etc. to the same `Contact` data structure in the near future. I didn't think those quantities were optional. If they are,  `CompositeData` makes sense.
content.html: I'm only including the location for now in the interest of time. In fact, we only really need the ids of the two bodies in contact. My goal was to add the normal, wrench, etc. to the same Contact data structure in the near future. I didn't think those quantities were optional. If they are, CompositeData makes sense.
